day 1.notes: Maintain a controlled tempo: 3-1-1-0 for all exercises.
day 1.explanations: Focused on chest development with Bench Press and Incline Bench Press targeting mid and upper chest respectively. Flat DB Fly isolates the mid chest, while DB Shoulder Presses engage the shoulders. Cable Rope Pushdowns ensure balanced triceps development, supporting overall push strength.

day 2.notes: Engage the core during Single Arm DB Rows for stability.
day 2.explanations: Lat Pulldown and Seated Lat Bar Row focus on the lats and back, essential for a balanced upper body. Single Arm DB Row ensures unilateral strength and muscle symmetry. Machine Tricep Overhead Extensions provide additional tricep work supporting pull exercises. Plank targets the core, enhancing overall stability and supporting muscle symmetry.

day 3.notes: Focus on full range of motion and controlled movements.
day 3.explanations: Leg Press targets quads and glutes without involving squatting motions, adhering to exercise limitations. Stretch Biased Seated Hamstring Curls and Glute Bridge Machine focus on hamstrings and glutes for balanced leg development. Seated Calf Raise Machine ensures calf strength. Bicycle Crunch incorporates core work, aligning with user's priority on abs.

day 5.notes: Ensure proper form to maximize chest engagement and prevent injury.
day 5.explanations: Incline DB Flys and Machine Press focus on upper and mid chest, enhancing chest development. DB Full ROM Raises target the shoulders, supporting a balanced push movement. Cable V-Grip Pushdowns provide tricep strength essential for push exercises. Russian Twist integrates core work, supporting the user's emphasis on abs.

day 6.notes: Maintain a steady pace to enhance back and core engagement.
day 6.explanations: Lat Pulldown and Seated Single Arm Cable Row target the back muscles, ensuring balanced pull development. Reverse Cable Rear Delt Fly focuses on rear delts and rhomboids for shoulder health and posture. Hammer Curls provide additional bicep engagement supporting pull movements. Plank reinforces core strength, aligning with the user's focus on abs.
